hero.title: Luxury Properties in Monaco & French Riviera
hero.subtitle: Experience the pinnacle of luxury living with our exclusive properties in Monaco and the French Riviera

about.title: Experience Luxury Living
about.description: Riviera Stays offers a curated collection of the most prestigious properties in Monaco and the French Riviera. From modern penthouses with panoramic sea views to historic villas with Mediterranean gardens, our properties embody the essence of luxury living on the Côte d'Azur.

properties.subtitle: Discover our selection of the most prestigious properties

properties.title: Our Luxury Properties
properties.subtitle: Discover our exclusive selection of luxury properties in Monaco and the French Riviera

contact.title: Interested in this property?
contact.description: Our team is ready to provide you with more information and arrange a viewing.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team to inquire about our luxury properties or to request a custom proposal for your stay in Monaco or the French Riviera.

about.title: About Riviera Stays
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for luxury accommodations in Monaco and the French Riviera

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Riviera Stays, our mission is to provide discerning travelers with access to the most exceptional properties in Monaco and the French Riviera, complemented by personalized service that anticipates and exceeds expectations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We are committed to excellence in every aspect of our service, from the properties we select to the experiences we create.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with complete transparency and honesty, building lasting relationships with our clients and partners.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: We understand that each client is unique, and we tailor our services to meet individual preferences and requirements.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our diverse team of professionals brings together expertise in luxury real estate, hospitality, and local knowledge to ensure an unparalleled experience for our clients.
